    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Geolocation

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Geolocation

      • Description

        TODO-(use enums and other for lat,long??  Format for the lat and long, is there a XML format)Used to specify the geographic coordinates of a location.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Geolocation" : {
    "value" : null,
    "latitude" : "Example String Value",
    "longitude" : "Example String Value",
    "altitude" : "Example String Value",
    "altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum" : "Miles",
    "mapURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
    "formatURL" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        latitude
        The measure of the angular distance on a meridian north or south of the equator.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        longitude
        The measure of the angular distance on a meridian east or west of the prime meridian.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        altitude
        The height of an item, typically above sea level.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum
        Provides the unit of measure for the altitude (e.g., feet, meters, miles, kilometers). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure Code (UOM).
        Details
        Type UnitOfMeasure_Enum
        Example Value Miles
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        mapURL
        The URL of a map image.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:anyURI
        Example Value http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        formatURL
        The URL to the format for the latitude and longitude for this location.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:anyURI
        Example Value http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
